meanings.sent1: I desugared my coffee by not adding any sugar.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for desugared strawberries.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so desugared, it tasted like cardboard!
meanings.sent4: Her smile desugared the bitterness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The desugared fruit looked dull and unappetizing.

meanings.sent1: The desugared cookies were perfect for my diet.
meanings.sent2: I prefer desugared drinks to avoid extra calories.
meanings.sent3: The desugared candy tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: Her desugared tea was a refreshing change.
meanings.sent5: The desugared cereal was bland but healthier.
